author: wn.com
title: Jose Mourinho blanks media after being sent off in Chelsea's loss to West Ham (PFA ...
text: ( Source : PFA - Professional Footballers' Association ) Jose Mourinho refused to speak to the media after he was sent to the stands during Chelsea's 2-1 defeat at West Ham . The Blues ' dreadful season hit a new low as they imploded at Upton
